statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating = 5;
SELECT feedback_id, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating >= 3 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, rating FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY rating ASC, created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' AND created_at < '2022-01-31' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedback, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%A%' AND email LIKE '%gmail%';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email NOT LIKE '%yahoo%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC, phone_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM customers JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id WHERE feedback.rating = 5;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customers LEFT JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id WHERE feedback.rating >= 3;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, timestamp FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_id, rating FROM CustomerFeedback JOIN FeedbackRating ON CustomerFeedback.feedback_id = FeedbackRating.feedback_id WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_feedback > 2;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, customer_id, timestamp FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, customer_id, timestamp FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE 'example%' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback JOIN Customers ON CustomerFeedback.customer_id = Customers.customer_id;
SELECT feedback_id, SUM(rating) AS total_rating FROM CustomerFeedback JOIN FeedbackRating ON CustomerFeedback.feedback_id = FeedbackRating.feedback_id GROUP BY feedback_id ORDER BY total_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating = 5;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM feedback_category ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, date_submitted FROM feedback_history ORDER BY date_submitted ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback JOIN customer ON customer_feedback.customer_id = customer.customer_id
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT cf.feedback_id, fh.date_submitted, fc.category_name FROM customer_feedback cf JOIN feedback_history fh ON cf.feedback_id = fh.feedback_id JOIN feedback_category fc ON fc.category_id = 1
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_feedback > 1 ORDER BY total_feedback DESC
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, timestamp FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM Customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT rating_description, rating_value FROM FeedbackRatingScale ORDER BY rating_value ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, AVG(feedback_rating) AS average_rating FROM FeedbackAnalytics GROUP BY feedback_id;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM Customers
SELECT feedback_text, timestamp FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id=123
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_rating FROM FeedbackAnalytics ORDER BY feedback_rating DESC
SELECT response_text FROM FeedbackResponses WHERE response_id=5
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback JOIN Customers ON CustomerFeedback.customer_id = Customers.customer_id
